author: rse
msg: Some indentation cosmetics because with the ap_ prefix some long lines moved.

author: rse
msg: Change usage of perror()+fprintf(stderr,...) in mod_rewrite to more proper
ap_log_error() variants. Same Brian has done for the other modules, BTW.

author: rse
msg: It's incorrect to use trailing newline characters in the string to
ap_log_error() because ap_log_error() adds itself a newline when logging to
files and wants to add nothing when logging to syslog.

author: rse
